content: phd candidate phd candidate details difficulty based on the very first colorwork sweater that makes an appearance in the netflix movie don t look up worn by the film s heroine jennifer lawrence a poignant satire based on the imminent danger of global warming vs humanity s pattern of averting our attention to more shallow and trivial things especially if they benefit us in the short term it s ok to look down at your knitting for a while to make yourself this iconic pullover this sweater is knit in the round from the top-down so you can try it on as you go the sleeves are then picked up and finished last for a completely seamless project the circular yoke upper body and sleeves are embellished with bands of bold colorwork knit in hikoo sueño worsted a soft shining worsted ® weight yarn featuring a blend of huggable superwash merino & springy viscose from bamboo also featuring 2 colors of zitron extra klasse mohair held with both contrasting colors for a bit of fuzz techniques tubular cast-on german short row stranded colorwork picking up stitches cable cast-on tubular bind-off yarn this sweater is designed for heavy worsted/aran weight yarn i held extra klasse double with the contrasting colors of sueño worsted hikoo® sueño worsted 80% superwash merino 20% viscose from bamboo 1 hank equals 100g / 182yds 3 5oz / 166m zitron® extra klasse 100% kid mohair 1 ball equals 25g / 246yds 0 88oz / 225m 1 xs-s 2 m-l 3 xl-2xl 4 3xl-4xl 5 5xl mc 4 balls 4 balls 5 balls 5 balls 6 balls sueño worsted #1302 caramel 640 yds 699 yds 805 yds 852 yds 974 yds 585 m 639 m 736 m 779 m 890 m cc1 1 ball 1 ball 1 ball 2 balls 2 balls sueño worsted #1316 ballet slipper 82 yds 105 yds 120 yds 214 yds 298 yds extra klasse #4505 - pink 75 m 96 m 109 m 195 m 272 m cc2 1 ball 2 balls 2 balls 2 balls 2 balls sueño worsted #1333 charcoal 205 yds 234 yds 276 yds 319 yds 340 yds extra klasse #4508 - black 187 m 214 m 252 m 291 m 311 m © copyright dear ingénue | all rights reserved | 2022 | v 1 1 1 phd candidate needles smaller needles us 7 4 5 mm 16 32 40 cm 80cm circular needles / dpns for sleeves larger needles - us 9 5 5 mm 32 80 cm circular needles / dpns for sleeves gauge 20 sts & 24 row = 4 10 cm in stockinette approx 5 x 6 sts per 1 2 5 cm after blocking notions tapestry needle stitch markers scissors scrap yarn & crochet hook approx 4 5mm for tubular cast-on additional notes be sure to read through the instructions carefully before you begin the colorwork charts are located on page 8 & written instructions for charts are located on page 9 instructions
